Open page.xaml.cs and add references to the service and to the System.Data.Services.Client assembly by adding the following using statements at the top of the file:

We need at create a data service context to reference the data from the service and to load data from the view, sparqlview, exposed by the service. Add the following lines to the page constructor after InitializeComponent()
listitem.programlisting: DataServiceContext svcCtx = new DataServiceContext(new Uri("WebDataService1.svc", UriKind.Relative)); svcCtx.BeginExecute<sparqlview>(new Uri("sparqlview", UriKind.Relative), loadSCallback, svcCtx);

listitem.para: Add the loadSCallback method to the page class. The method loads the data from sparqlview and puts it in a List. This List populates a list box on the page.
